body.p: The MDIO modules is used for switch configuration and status monitoring. The downlink of switch is 4 10/100 ports terminated in 2x2 RJ-45 connector on carrier card through magnetic.

Switch registers are accessed through SMI interface of switch and MDC/MDIO interface of MPC8306. Becauseof register addressing scheme of Ethernet switch over SMI interface, PHY address range from 0x00 to 0x0F of MDC/MDIO interface is blocked. Hence any external PHY used with this switch need to be addressed from 0x10 to 0x1F.
